name: Deep Blue, the Phantom Board
text:
U: Produce R or G.
2, T: Search your main deck for a Soldier resonator with total cost 1 or less, reveal it and put it into your hand. If your J/ruler is "Alice, the Girl in the Looking Glass", "Alice, the Saint of Healing" or "Alice, the Valkyrie of Fairy Tales", you may put it into your field instead. Then shuffle your main deck.
Discard another card named "Deep Blue the Phantom Board": Produce R, U or G.
set: The Seven Kings of the Lands
